name: Rusty Retriever
description:
Have you missed your old Gameboy? Feel like having that last slice of pizza for dinner, but don’t remember where did you put it? Rusty Retriever is an arcade game that may be a solution for your problems! In the game you’re a mole, in a duty of collecting old objects from the junkyard and retrieving them to some happy (but cranky) workers. Find the missed objects while you still have time! HOW TO PLAY: Press Space Bar to Grab and Drop the objects. Move your character with W A S D keys. Press E to Spread it all around! Have fun!

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/rusty-retriever-1
